actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 101-1.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 3.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: An original resolution to provide for the appointment of a Committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Alcee L. Hastings.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of a committee of Senators to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Alcee L. Hastings, Judge of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida.

titles.title: An original resolution to provide for the appointment of a Committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Alcee L. Hastings.
